content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received an error message when attempting to use the browse_website command to visit AllTrails. As a result, I decided to use the web_search command to search for the best hiking trails near Brno. The web_search command returned several links to hiking trails, including AllTrails and Komoot. Additionally, I executed the execute_shell command and received a list of files in my directory.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "atlas.yaml"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command read_file returned: {'ai_goals': ['explore the world'], 'ai_name': 'Atlas', 'ai_role': 'Atlas is a Tiny Little Adventuring Soul'}", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "import googlemaps\\n\\n# Define the API Key\\napi_key = \\"YOUR_API_KEY\\"\\n\\n# Define the Client\\nclient = googlemaps.Client(api_key)\\n\\n# Define the Location\\nlocation = \\"Brno, Czech Republic\\"\\n\\n# Define the Search Query\\nsearch_query = \\"hiking trails\\"\\n\\n# Define the Radius (in meters)\\nradius = 10000\\n\\n# Define the Type of Place\\nplace_type = \\"park\\"\\n\\n# Define the Fields to Retrieve\\nfields = [\\"name\\", \\"formatted_address\\", \\"geometry\\", \\"rating\\", \\"types\\"]\\n\\n# Perform a Nearby Search\\nplaces = client.places_nearby(location=location, keyword=search_query, radius=radius, type=place_type, fields=fields)\\n\\n# Print the Results\\nfor place in places[\\"results\\"]:\\n    print(place[\\"name\\"] + \\" - \\" + place[\\"formatted_address\\"])\\n"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_python_code returned: Error: execute_python_code() missing 1 required positional argument: 'name'", type='action_result')]
"""
